meanings.sent1: The talented dramatists crafted a new play for the theater.
meanings.sent2: Many famous dramatists have won awards for their plays.
meanings.sent3: The dramatists decided to write a comedy about talking animals.

meanings.sent2: The local community theater is always looking for new dramatists to join.
